name: Young Boreal Dragon
movement: fly 80 ft., walk 40 ft., swim 30 ft.
description: The Young Boreal Dragon is a large, formidable creature with scales that shimmer with icy hues. It possesses a strong physique and agile wings, allowing it to navigate aerial combat effectively.
memorable: It can unleash a devastating Cinder Breath attack that affects multiple foes within a wide area.
goals: To dominate the battlefield through power and control, leveraging its breath weapon to damage multiple enemies.
relations: Might be encountered with other dragons or chaotic creatures inhabiting cold environments.
environment: Typically found in frigid regions, including snowy mountains and icy landscapes.
strengths: Immunity to fire damage and resistance to cold damage, making it resilient against elemental attacks.
weaknesses: Weak against cold damage, limiting its effectiveness in icy environments.
attacks: The dragon can attack with a powerful bite and sharp claws, dealing significant piercing and slashing damage.
most_powerful_ability: Cinder Breath, exhaling fire in a 30-foot cone, causing high damage to multiple enemies.
senses: Blindsight up to 30 feet allows it to detect nearby foes without needing light.
skills: Exceptional in athletics and perception, making it adept at physical challenges and noticing hidden threats.
additional_information: High hit points at 142, providing resilience in combat.
Can execute a Multiattack with three attacks in one turn.
Dexterity score is average, affecting its agility.
Challenging opponent with a Challenge Rating of 8.
test_queries: chaotic dragon with high hit points
dragon with a devastating fire breath attack
